p:
Eqs. ( 2) and ( 3) were used to calculate the biomass and lipid yield coefficients (Y X/S and Y P/S, respectively):
2
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ {Y}_{X/S}=\varDelta \mathrm{X}/\varDelta \mathrm{S} $$\end{document}
Y
X / S
= Δ X / Δ S
3
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ {Y}_{P/S}=\varDelta \mathrm{P}/\varDelta \mathrm{S} $$\end{document}
Y
P / S
= Δ P / Δ S
